resources.string: This option is currently not implemented.
Please fix Iristick glasses error(s) before starting a call.
Please connect your Iristick smart glasses.
Please install the Iristick Services before using this app.
Please upgrade the Iristick Services to the latest version before using this app.
Please upgrade this app or downgrade the Iristick Services.
The provided license file is invalid or has expired. The examples will not work.
Room name needs to have at least 2 characters.
An unknown error has occurred while connecting to the Iristick Services (code %d).
